note: Specialized runner - see extra_data for details

vulnerability_location.description: External call to _addr.call.value() is made before updating the Holders balance, enabling a reentrant call to Deposit (or other functions) to manipulate the mapping before it is decremented.
Unrestricted addition to Holders[msg.sender] in Deposit (possible overflow) and subtraction in WithdrawToHolder without ensuring _wei <= Holders[_addr] (underflow)
Low-level call to token.transfer via token.call(...) without checking the return value
Function initTokenBank is intended as a constructor but is not named after the contract, allowing anyone to call it post‐deployment to reset owner and MinDeposit.
